name: mise-manager
title: Mise Manager
description: Manage mise tools, plugins, and configuration directly from Raycast.
author: imbolt

commands.name: show-installed
commands.title: Installed Tools
commands.description: Inspect installed mise tools and their versions.

commands.name: search
commands.title: Search Registry
commands.description: Search the mise registry and install tools.

commands.name: prune
commands.title: Prune
commands.description: Remove unused tool versions from disk.

commands.name: show-outdated
commands.title: Outdated Tools
commands.description: List installed tools with available upgrades.

commands.name: doctor
commands.title: Doctor
commands.description: Run mise doctor and review environment diagnostics.

commands.name: settings
commands.title: Settings
commands.description: View and update mise configuration options.

commands.name: add-plugin
commands.title: Add Plugin
commands.description: Install a new mise plugin by name or git URL.

commands.name: remove-plugin
commands.title: Remove Plugin
commands.description: Uninstall a previously added mise plugin.

commands.name: open-cache-directory
commands.title: Open Cache Directory
commands.description: Reveal the mise cache directory in Finder.

commands.name: install-using-backend
commands.title: Install Using Backend
commands.description: Install a tool using a specific backend and scope.

commands.name: upgrade-mise
commands.title: Upgrade Mise
commands.description: Update the mise CLI to the latest version.

commands.name: upgrade-tool
commands.title: Upgrade Tool
commands.description: Select and upgrade an installed tool.

commands.name: clean-cache
commands.title: Clean Cache
commands.description: Clean mise cache to free up space.

commands.name: run-task
commands.title: Run Task
commands.description: List and run project tasks defined in mise.toml.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
